fullText: The song turns out to be representative of the entire shattering-yet-optimistic musical it’s part of. Driven by authenticity, earnestness, youth and ample heart, “The Outsiders” is very much an outsider itself.

showScoreExcerpt: "The tender tune, accompanied by an acoustic guitar...it’s a moment of pure catharsis"
